simple.name: device_kind
simple.description: This specifies the device kind

simple.name: device_model
simple.description: This specifies the specific device

structsequence.name: frontend_tuner_status
structsequence.description: Status of each tuner, including entries for both allocated and un-allocated tuners. Each entry represents a single tuner.

simple.name: allocation_id_csv
simple.description: Comma separated list of current Allocation IDs.

simple.name: bandwidth
simple.description: Current bandwidth in Hz

simple.name: center_frequency
simple.description: Current center frequency in Hz.

simple.name: enabled
simple.description: Indicates if tuner is enabled, in reference to the output state of the tuner.

simple.name: group_id
simple.description: Unique ID that specifies a group of Device.

simple.name: rf_flow_id
simple.description: Specifies a certain RF flow to allocate against.

simple.name: sample_rate
simple.description: Current sample rate in samples per second.

simple.name: scan_mode_enabled
simple.description: True if scan mode is enabled. False if Manual Tune is enabled

simple.name: supports_scan
simple.description: True if scan is supported

simple.name: tuner_type
simple.description: Example Tuner Types: ANTENNA, RX, RX_ARRAY, DBOT, ABOT, ARDC, RDC, SRDC, DRDC, TX, TX_ARRAY, TDC

simple.name: bandwidth_tolerance
simple.description: Allowable percentage over requested bandwidth. This value is provided by the requester during allocation.

simple.name: sample_rate_tolerance
simple.description: Allowable percentage over requested sample rate. This value is provided by the requester during allocation.

struct.name: frontend_listener_allocation
struct.description: Allocation structure to acquire "listener" capability on a tuner based off a previous allocation. "Listeners" have the ability to receive the data but can not modify the settings of the tuner.

simple.name: existing_allocation_id
simple.description: Allocation ID for an existing allocation. Could be either control or listener.

simple.name: listener_allocation_id
simple.description: New Listener ID

struct.name: frontend_tuner_allocation
struct.description: Allocation structure to acquire capability on a tuner based off tuner settings

simple.name: tuner_type
simple.description: Example Tuner Types: ANTENNA, RX, RX_ARRAY, DBOT, ABOT, ARDC, RDC, SRDC, DRDC, TX, TX_ARRAY, TDC

simple.name: allocation_id
simple.description: The allocation_id set by the caller. Used by the caller to reference the allocation uniquely

simple.name: center_frequency
simple.description: Requested center frequency

simple.name: bandwidth
simple.description: Requested bandwidth (+/- the tolerance)

simple.name: bandwidth_tolerance
simple.description: Allowable Percent above requested bandwidth (ie - 100 would be up to twice)

simple.name: sample_rate
simple.description: Requested sample rate (+/- the tolerance). This can be ignored for such devices as analog tuners

simple.name: sample_rate_tolerance
simple.description: Allowable Percent above requested sample rate (ie - 100 would be up to twice)

simple.name: device_control
simple.description: True: Has control over the device to make changes False: Does not need control and can just attach to any currently tasked device that satisfies the parameters (essentually a listener)

simple.name: group_id
simple.description: Unique identifier that specifies the group a device must be in. Must match group_id on the device

simple.name: rf_flow_id
simple.description: Optional. Specifies the RF flow of a specific input source to allocate against. If left empty, it will match all FrontEnd devices.

simple.name: min_freq
simple.description: Requested lower edge of the scanning band

simple.name: max_freq
simple.description: Requested upper edge of the scanning band

simple.name: mode
simple.description: SPAN_SCAN or DISCRETE_SCAN

simple.name: control_mode
simple.description: TIME_BASED or SAMPLE_BASED

simple.name: control_limit
simple.description: Either the fastest hop rate (TIME_BASED) or shortest set of samples (SAMPLE_BASED) that the scanner is expected to support. In samples, the number that will be needed before the next retune, equivalent to control_limit >= sample_rate/(max_settle_time+min_dwell_time) is met before the next retune.
Indicates whether the clock source is synchronized with the digitizer.
device IP address (leave empty to search for available devices)

struct.name: device_characteristics
struct.description: Describes the channels found in the digitizer

simple.name: chan_num
simple.description: This is the per tuner type channel number. This means that there could be a tuner 0 for an RX and a tuner 0 for a TX.

simplesequence.name: available_antennas
simplesequence.description: List of antennas available for this device.

simple.name: device_mode
simple.description: 16bit or 8bit
